StaticPage.title: Support - Pavilion

AboutUs.title: About
AboutUs.introduction: Pavilion Network is a revolutionary decentralized social media platform designed to empower content creators through blockchain technology. Our mission is to provide transparent, equitable, and innovative tools that grant creators full control over their content and monetization strategies. By leveraging a decentralized infrastructure, Pavilion ensures security, scalability, and transparency, enabling trustless interactions and fostering a sustainable ecosystem where creators can thrive on their own terms.
AboutUs.visionText: We aim to redefine digital content creation by building the world's foremost decentralized platform that returns power to creators. Our goal is to enable innovation, ownership, and prosperity in the digital age, ensuring every creator has the opportunity to succeed and shape the future of media.
AboutUs.fairCompensation: Fair Compensation: Creators earn directly from their content through transparent, blockchain-enabled payment systems, ensuring timely and equitable remuneration.
AboutUs.transparentAlgorithms: Transparent Algorithms: Unlike traditional platforms with opaque algorithms, Pavilion offers clear, blockchain-based criteria for content promotion, allowing creators to understand how their work is distributed and valued.
AboutUs.contentOwnership: Content Ownership: Creators retain absolute ownership of their content, with blockchain technology safeguarding their rights immutably.
AboutUs.flexibleMonetization: Flexible Monetization Options: Multiple revenue streams are available, including ads, subscriptions, and direct sales, tailored to diverse creator needs.
AboutUs.decentralizedGovernance: Decentralized Governance: Our community-driven approach ensures that creators have a voice in platform decisions, promoting a collaborative environment.
AboutUs.advancedCreationTools: Advanced Creation Tools: State-of-the-art tools enhance content production, enabling creators to produce high-quality material and engage effectively with their audience.
AboutUs.communitySupport: Community Support and Collaboration: Pavilion fosters a supportive environment where creators can collaborate, share insights, and grow together, enhancing each individual's potential.
AboutUs.openSourceText: Pavilion is built on open-source solutions, including Ethereum, Tendermint, DeepSeek, Jitsi, NGINX, CockroachDB, ScyllaDB and Apache Pulsar. This approach ensures transparency, security, and customization, allowing the community to contribute to and shape the platform's evolution.
AboutUs.tokenomicsText: A significant portion of Pavilion's tokens is allocated to the treasury to support future development and fundraising efforts. Our roadmap includes blockchain integration, server rewards, open APIs, a blockchain-based advertising model, AI-powered media tools, and diversification of content and revenue streams. These initiatives underscore our commitment to sustained technological advancement and addressing the challenges of the modern digital economy. For more, see the <0>whitepaper</0>.
AboutUs.joinUsText: At Pavilion Network, we're shifting the focus from platform-centric to creator-centric models, using blockchain to ensure transparency, ownership, and fair compensation. Our goal is to empower creators with the tools they need for success in a decentralized media landscape. Join us as we pave the way for a more secure, efficient, and inclusive future in digital content creation. <0>Join us</0> now!

PrivacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
PrivacyPolicy.introductionText: Pavilion is built on a decentralized infrastructure, meaning that user data is not controlled by a single entity but rather distributed across the network. We minimize data collection and give users full ownership of their content and identity.
PrivacyPolicy.informationWeCollectText: Since Pavilion is a decentralized platform, we do not store or process personal data in a centralized database. However, some limited information may be collected based on how you interact with the network:
PrivacyPolicy.informationYouProvideText1: Public Profile Data: If you choose to create a profile, certain information (such as username, avatar, and bio) will be stored on the blockchain and visible to the public.
PrivacyPolicy.informationYouProvideText2: Content You Post: Pavilion does not control your data, but any content you publish on the network is stored in a decentralized manner and may be visible to other users.
PrivacyPolicy.informationCollectedAutomaticallyText1: Blockchain Transactions: Pavilion operates on a blockchain network, meaning all interactions (e.g., posting, tipping, governance participation) are recorded transparently.
PrivacyPolicy.informationCollectedAutomaticallyText2: Multimedia Files: Multimedia files are stored on our distributed IPFS servers and CDN. This hybrid model provides more efficiency and fault tolerance while maintaining decentralization principles.
PrivacyPolicy.informationCollectedAutomaticallyText3: Storage Usage: Pavilion does not manage decentralized storage solutions directly. Any content uploaded may be stored using third-party decentralized storage services such as IPFS or Arweave, which operate independently of Pavilion.
PrivacyPolicy.thirdPartyIntegrationsText: Pavilion may integrate with external wallets (e.g., MetaMask, WalletConnect) for authentication and payments. We do not have access to your private keys or financial data.
PrivacyPolicy.howYourInformationIsUsedText: Since Pavilion is decentralized, we do not collect or use personal data for commercial purposes. However, the following decentralized mechanisms apply:
PrivacyPolicy.howYourInformationIsUsedListItem1: Public Content: Any content posted on the blockchain is permanent and cannot be deleted by Pavilion.
PrivacyPolicy.howYourInformationIsUsedListItem2: User Governance: Decisions regarding platform changes may involve community voting, with some data (e.g., governance participation) recorded on-chain.
PrivacyPolicy.howYourInformationIsUsedListItem3: Security & Spam Prevention: We may implement decentralized moderation tools to mitigate spam or harmful activities.
PrivacyPolicy.dataOwnershipAndControlText1: Pavilion gives full control to users over their content and identity.
PrivacyPolicy.dataOwnershipAndControlListItem1: You control your private keys and digital identity.
PrivacyPolicy.dataOwnershipAndControlListItem2: You can choose how and where to store your content.
PrivacyPolicy.dataOwnershipAndControlListItem3: Pavilion cannot alter or remove any data recorded on the blockchain.
PrivacyPolicy.dataOwnershipAndControlText2: Since content is stored on a decentralized network, traditional data deletion methods do not apply. However, you may:
PrivacyPolicy.dataOwnershipAndControlListItem4: Remove content references from your profile.
PrivacyPolicy.dataOwnershipAndControlListItem5: Use encryption techniques to protect personal data before publishing.
PrivacyPolicy.securityMeasuresText: Pavilion implements security measures aligned with decentralized best practices:
PrivacyPolicy.securityMeasuresListItem1: No Centralized Data Storage: Your information is never stored on Pavilion's centralized servers.
PrivacyPolicy.securityMeasuresListItem2: Cryptographic Security: Transactions and interactions rely on blockchain cryptography to ensure transparency and security.
PrivacyPolicy.securityMeasuresListItem3: Decentralized Identity: Pavilion supports blockchain-based identity management to prevent unauthorized access.
PrivacyPolicy.thirdPartyServicesText: Pavilion may integrate with decentralized identity providers, wallets, and external applications. We do not control their data handling policies. Please review their privacy policies before engaging with third-party services.
PrivacyPolicy.childrensPrivacyText: Pavilion is not intended for use by individuals under 13 years of age. Since we do not collect centralized user data, we cannot verify age; parents should monitor their child's online activity.
PrivacyPolicy.changesToThisPolicyText: Pavilion operates as a decentralized platform, and governance updates may affect this Privacy Policy. Any significant updates will be communicated through community channels and governance votes.
PrivacyPolicy.contactAndQuestionsText: Since Pavilion is decentralized, there is no central entity managing user data. However, community support is available through official Pavilion forums and communication channels. For further inquiries, reach out through our decentralized governance forums or <0>community discussions</0>.
PrivacyPolicy.conclusion: By using Pavilion, you acknowledge and accept this decentralized privacy framework. Pavilion is committed to user autonomy, transparency, and security in the decentralized social media landscape.
PrivacyPolicy.welcomeText: Welcome to Pavilion, a decentralized social media platform designed to empower content creators through blockchain technology. Your privacy is important to us. This Privacy Policy outlines how Pavilion handles your data and ensures transparency in our decentralized ecosystem.

TermsAndConditions.text2: These terms and conditions outline the rules and regulations for the use of Pavilion's Website, located at <0>app.pavilion.network</0>.
TermsAndConditions.text3: By accessing this website we assume you accept these terms and conditions. Do not continue to use Pavilion if you do not agree to take all of the terms and conditions stated on this page.
TermsAndConditions.text4: The following terminology applies to these Terms and Conditions, Privacy Statement and Disclaimer Notice and all Agreements: "Client", "You" and "Your" refers to you, the person log on this website and compliant to the Company’s terms and conditions. "The Company", "Ourselves", "We", "Our" and "Us", refers to our Company. "Party", "Parties", or "Us", refers to both the Client and ourselves. All terms refer to the offer, acceptance and consideration of payment necessary to undertake the process of our assistance to the Client in the most appropriate manner for the express purpose of meeting the Client’s needs in respect of provision of the Company’s stated services, in accordance with and subject to, prevailing law of Turkey. Any use of the above terminology or other words in the singular, plural, capitalization and/or he/she or they, are taken as interchangeable and therefore as referring to same.
TermsAndConditions.description11: We employ the use of cookies. By accessing Pavilion, you agreed to use cookies in agreement with the Pavilion's Privacy Policy.
TermsAndConditions.description12: Most interactive websites use cookies to let us retrieve the user’s details for each visit. Cookies are used by our website to enable the functionality of certain areas to make it easier for people visiting our website. Some of our affiliate/advertising partners may also use cookies.
TermsAndConditions.description21: Unless otherwise stated, Pavilion and/or its licensors own the intellectual property rights for all material on Pavilion. All intellectual property rights are reserved. You may access this from Pavilion for your own personal use subjected to restrictions set in these terms and conditions.
TermsAndConditions.description22ListItem2: Sell, rent or sub-license material from Pavilion
TermsAndConditions.description22ListItem3: Reproduce, duplicate or copy material from Pavilion
TermsAndConditions.description23: This Agreement shall begin on the date hereof. Our Terms and Conditions were created with the help of the Free Terms and Conditions Generator.
TermsAndConditions.description24: Parts of this website offer an opportunity for users to post and exchange opinions and information in certain areas of the website. Pavilion.io does not filter, edit, publish or review Comments prior to their presence on the website. Comments do not reflect the views and opinions of Pavilion.io,its agents and/or affiliates. Comments reflect the views and opinions of the person who post their views and opinions. To the extent permitted by applicable laws, Pavilion.io shall not be liable for the Comments or for any liability, damages or expenses caused and/or suffered as a result of any use of and/or posting of and/or appearance of the Comments on this website.
TermsAndConditions.description25: Pavilion.io reserves the right to monitor all Comments and to remove any Comments which can be considered inappropriate, offensive or causes breach of these Terms and Conditions.
TermsAndConditions.description26ListItem1: You are entitled to post the Comments on our website and have all necessary licenses and consents to do so;
TermsAndConditions.description26ListItem2: The Comments do not invade any intellectual property right, including without limitation copyright, patent or trademark of any third party;
TermsAndConditions.description26ListItem3: The Comments do not contain any defamatory, libelous, offensive, indecent or otherwise unlawful material which is an invasion of privacy
TermsAndConditions.description26ListItem4: The Comments will not be used to solicit or promote business or custom or present commercial activities or unlawful activity.
TermsAndConditions.description27: You hereby grant Pavilion.io a non-exclusive license to use, reproduce, edit and authorize others to use, reproduce and edit any of your Comments in any and all forms, formats or media.
TermsAndConditions.description31: The following organizations may link to our Website without prior written approval:
TermsAndConditions.description31ListItem4: Online directory distributors may link to our Website in the same manner as they hyperlink to the Websites of other listed businesses; and
TermsAndConditions.description31ListItem5: System wide Accredited Businesses except soliciting non-profit organizations, charity shopping malls, and charity fundraising groups which may not hyperlink to our Web site.
TermsAndConditions.description32: These organizations may link to our home page, to publications or to other Website information so long as the link: (a) is not in any way deceptive; (b) does not falsely imply sponsorship, endorsement or approval of the linking party and its products and/or services; and (c) fits within the context of the linking party’s site.
TermsAndConditions.description33: We may consider and approve other link requests from the following types of organizations:
TermsAndConditions.description33ListItem1: commonly-known consumer and/or business information sources;
TermsAndConditions.description33ListItem3: associations or other groups representing charities;
TermsAndConditions.description33ListItem6: accounting, law and consulting firms; and
TermsAndConditions.description34: We will approve link requests from these organizations if we decide that: (a) the link would not make us look unfavorably to ourselves or to our accredited businesses; (b) the organization does not have any negative records with us; (c) the benefit to us from the visibility of the hyperlink compensates the absence of Pavilion.io; and (d) the link is in the context of general resource information.
TermsAndConditions.description35: These organizations may link to our home page so long as the link: (a) is not in any way deceptive; (b) does not falsely imply sponsorship, endorsement or approval of the linking party and its products or services; and (c) fits within the context of the linking party’s site.
TermsAndConditions.description36: If you are one of the organizations listed in paragraph 2 above and are interested in linking to our website, you must inform us by sending an e-mail to Pavilion.io. Please include your name, your organization name, contact information as well as the URL of your site, a list of any URLs from which you intend to link to our Website, and a list of the URLs on our site to which you would like to link. Wait 2-3 weeks for a response.
TermsAndConditions.description37: Approved organizations may hyperlink to our Website as follows:
TermsAndConditions.description37ListItem1: By use of our corporate name; or
TermsAndConditions.description37ListItem2: By use of the uniform resource locator being linked to; or
TermsAndConditions.description37ListItem3: By use of any other description of our Website being linked to that makes sense within the context and format of content on the linking party’s site.
TermsAndConditions.description38: No use of Pavilion.io's logo or other artwork will be allowed for linking absent a trademark license agreement.
TermsAndConditions.description4: Without prior approval and written permission, you may not create frames around our Webpages that alter in any way the visual presentation or appearance of our Website.
TermsAndConditions.description5: We shall not be hold responsible for any content that appears on your Website. You agree to protect and defend us against all claims that is rising on your Website. No link(s) should appear on any Website that may be interpreted as libelous, obscene or criminal, or which infringes, otherwise violates, or advocates the infringement or other violation of, any third party rights.
TermsAndConditions.description7: We reserve the right to request that you remove all links or any particular link to our Website. You approve to immediately remove all links to our Website upon request. We also reserve the right to amen these terms and conditions and it’s linking policy at any time. By continuously linking to our Website, you agree to be bound to and follow these linking terms and conditions.
TermsAndConditions.title8: Removal of links from our website
TermsAndConditions.description81: If you find any link on our Website that is offensive for any reason, you are free to contact and inform us any moment. We will consider requests to remove links but we are not obligated to or so or to respond to you directly.
TermsAndConditions.description82: We do not ensure that the information on this website is correct, we do not warrant its completeness or accuracy; nor do we promise to ensure that the website remains available or that the material on the website is kept up to date.
TermsAndConditions.description91: To the maximum extent permitted by applicable law, we exclude all representations, warranties and conditions relating to our website and the use of this website. Nothing in this disclaimer will:
TermsAndConditions.description91ListItem1: limit or exclude our or your liability for death or personal injury;
TermsAndConditions.description91ListItem2: limit or exclude our or your liability for fraud or fraudulent misrepresentation;
TermsAndConditions.description91ListItem3: limit any of our or your liabilities in any way that is not permitted under applicable law; or
TermsAndConditions.description91ListItem4: exclude any of our or your liabilities that may not be excluded under applicable law.
TermsAndConditions.description92: The limitations and prohibitions of liability set in this Section and elsewhere in this disclaimer: (a) are subject to the preceding paragraph; and (b) govern all liabilities arising under the disclaimer, including liabilities arising in contract, in tort and for breach of statutory duty.
TermsAndConditions.description93: As long as the website and the information and services on the website are provided free of charge, we will not be liable for any loss or damage of any nature.
TermsAndConditions.description10: Accounts on this site can be anonymized or deleted at the user’s request. Contact us at support@purpie.io for details.

Faq.a1: Pavilion is a decentralized, creator-centric social media platform that empowers users with full control over their content and monetization. Unlike traditional social media, Pavilion operates on blockchain technology, ensuring transparency, ownership, and fairness for creators.
Faq.q2: How is Pavilion different from traditional social media platforms?
Faq.a2: Unlike centralized social media platforms that control data, enforce content policies, and take a cut from creators, Pavilion is decentralized.
Faq.a2ListItem1: No central authority controls your content.
Faq.a2ListItem2: You retain full ownership and monetization rights.
Faq.a2ListItem3: Transactions and content interactions are transparent and secure through blockchain technology.
Faq.q3: How does Pavilion store my content?
Faq.a3: Pavilion uses a hybrid storage system, where multimedia files are stored on distributed IPFS servers and a CDN. This ensures efficient delivery and fault tolerance while maintaining decentralization principles.
Faq.a4: No, Pavilion does not have the ability to delete or modify user content, as it is stored on decentralized networks. However, users can choose to remove references to their content from their profiles, though data stored on blockchain-based storage solutions may persist.
Faq.q5: What happens if I lose my private keys?
Faq.a5: Losing your private keys means losing access to your account and content. Pavilion does not store or recover private keys, as security is entirely user-controlled. It is strongly recommended to securely store your private keys in a safe location.
Faq.a6: Yes, Pavilion is free to use. However, certain interactions, such as transactions or premium content access, may involve small blockchain network fees. Since Pavilion is in its alpha stage, all monetization and payment features are still under development and will be released over time.
Faq.q7: How can I monetize my content on Pavilion?
Faq.a7: Since Pavilion is in its alpha stage, all monetization and payment features are subject to development and will be released over time.
Faq.a7ListItem4: Selling digital assets such as NFTs.
Faq.q8: Does Pavilion have a moderation system?
Faq.a8: Since Pavilion is decentralized, there is no central moderation team. However, the community governs content moderation through reporting and decentralized governance mechanisms.
Faq.q9: What kind of content is allowed on Pavilion?
Faq.a9: Users must comply with applicable laws and respect the rights of others.
Faq.a9ListItem2: Hate speech or harassment is not allowed.
Faq.a9ListItem4: Violations may result in community-led reporting or filtering measures.
Faq.q10: Can I integrate Pavilion with other platforms?
Faq.a10: Yes, Pavilion supports integration with external wallets, identity providers, and decentralized storage solutions. Future updates may expand interoperability with other blockchain-based services.
Faq.q11: How does Pavilion handle user privacy?
Faq.a11: Pavilion does not collect or store personal data centrally. User interactions are secured through blockchain technology, and users retain full control over their digital identity and content.
Faq.q12: How do I report a problem or get support?
Faq.a12: Since Pavilion is decentralized, support is provided through community forums, governance discussions, and peer-to-peer assistance. Users can also contribute to the ecosystem by participating in governance and proposing improvements.
